text: The Football Federation of Chile (; FFC) is the governing body of football in Chile. It is in charge of the men's and the women's national teams. It was founded on 19 June 1895, which makes it the second oldest South American association football federation. The FFC became a member of FIFA in 1913 and CONMEBOL in 1916. title: Football Federation of Chile
